tool_description: USDA plant hardiness zone and average minimum winter temperature range for a given ZIP code in JSON format.
name: USDA Plant Hardiness Zones
title: USDA Plant Hardiness Zones

api_list.name: Get plant hardiness zone
api_list.description: Retrieve name, USDA plant hardiness zone and average minimum winter temperature range for the given ZIP code.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://usda-plant-hardiness-zones.p.rapidapi.com/zone/63101"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "usda-plant-hardiness-zones.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://usda-plant-hardiness-zones.p.rapidapi.com/zone/{zip}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "usda-plant-hardiness-zones.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
